mapper.sql: id, created_at, patient_id, chief, present_history, past_history, disease_id, infra_path, infra_desc, infra_excp, opinion, treat, treat_detail
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from record
order by ${orderByClause}

select id, created_at, patient_id, chief, present_history, past_history, disease_id, infra_path, infra_desc, infra_excp, opinion, treat, treat_detail from record where patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType = INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into record (id, created_at, patient_id, chief, present_history, past_history, disease_id, infra_path, infra_desc, infra_excp, opinion, treat, treat_detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pastHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diseaseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infraPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infraDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infraExcp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update record
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patient_id = #{record.patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chief = #{record.chief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

opinion = #{record.opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treat = #{record.treat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treat_detail = #{record.treatDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chief = #{chief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
present_history = #{presentHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

treat = #{treat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
